titleStmt.title: Phocæna, or The anatomy of a porpess dissected at Gresham Colledge: with a præliminary discourse concerning anatomy, and a natural history of animals.
titleStmt.author: Tyson, Edward, 1650-1708.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Benj. Tooke at the Ship in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1: A preliminary discourse concerning anatomy and a natural history of animals.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
